SIGNUP_SUCCESS: Hurray! You have successfully signed up!
PLEASE_VERIFY_EMAIL: We have sent a link to your email for verification. Please complete the verification process to login.
ENTER_EMAIL_WITH_NEWOR: Please enter your email registered with Newor
PLEASE_RESET_PASSWORD_EMAIL: We have sent a mail to you to reset your password. Please update your password to login.
EMAIL_VERIFICATION_SUCCESS: You have successfully verified your email with Newor. Please proceed with login.
EMAIL_VERIFICATION_FAILURE: Your email verification has failed. Please try again.
RESET_PASSWORD_SUCCESS: You have successfully reset your password for your email. Please proceed with login

ERROR_CODE.NEWOR_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again.
ERROR_CODE.NEWOR_USER_NOT_FOUND: Oops! We can't find your credentials. Please try signing up first.
ERROR_CODE.NEWOR_CLIENT_NOT_FOUND: Oops! Please try using authorized application.
ERROR_CODE.NEWOR_BAD_REQUEST: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again.
ERROR_CODE.NEWOR_INVALID_CREDENTIALS: Uh Oh! Incorrect login credentials. Please try again.
ERROR_CODE.NEWOR_EMAIL_NOT_VERIFIED: Oops! You haven't verified your email yet. Please complete your email verification to continue.
